device.notes: Updated with actual Tailscale hostname. Update ssh_user after running 'whoami' in Termux.

monitoring.notes: Check every 30s. After 5 failures, try to restart SSH. Backoff increases delay on repeated failures.

reconnection.notes: Restart command kills and restarts SSH daemon. Tailscale restart requires root (usually null).

notifications.notes: Logs to both file and console. Notifies on connection state changes.
